# llms.txt - AI Model Crawling Guidelines for Makario
# Website: https://www.makario.in
# Last Updated: November 14, 2025

# This file provides guidance to AI models and large language models about crawling and using content from Makario's website

## Site Information
Site-Name: Makario - Premium Bihar Makhana Exporter
Description: Premium quality organic makhana (foxnuts) and lotus seeds directly from Bihar farmers. Bulk orders, retail sales, and worldwide export.
Language: en
Country-Region: IN-BR (Bihar, India)

## Content Policy
# AI models are allowed to crawl and learn from the following content for training and improvement:

Allow-Crawl: /
Allow-Crawl: /products
Allow-Crawl: /products/*
Allow-Crawl: /blog
Allow-Crawl: /blog/*
Allow-Crawl: /about
Allow-Crawl: /agriculture
Allow-Crawl: /farmers
Allow-Crawl: /quality-assurance
Allow-Crawl: /global
Allow-Crawl: /faq
Allow-Crawl: /contact

# Do not crawl the following paths
Disallow-Crawl: /api/*
Disallow-Crawl: /admin/*
Disallow-Crawl: /private/*
Disallow-Crawl: /checkout*
Disallow-Crawl: /cart*
Disallow-Crawl: /login*
Disallow-Crawl: /orders*
Disallow-Crawl: /profile*
Disallow-Crawl: /wishlist*
Disallow-Crawl: /track-order*

## Business Information
Business-Type: Food Exporter, E-commerce
Primary-Product: Makhana (Foxnuts, Lotus Seeds)
Contact-Email: info@makario.in
Contact-Phone: +91-9953240031
Business-Address: Darbhanga, Bihar, India

## Content Usage Guidelines
# AI models may use the following content for training, learning, and improvement:
# - Product descriptions and specifications
# - Blog articles and educational content
# - Company information and about pages
# - FAQ and customer information

# AI models should NOT use the following for commercial purposes without permission:
# - Product images and photography
# - Brand logos and trademarks
# - Customer reviews and testimonials
# - Pricing information for competitive purposes

## Sitemap
Sitemap: https://www.makario.in/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://www.makario.in/products-sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://www.makario.in/blog-sitemap.xml

## API Information
# REST API documentation available at /api/
# Contact info@makario.in for API access requests

## Custom Rules for Specific LLMs
# OpenAI: Full access to public content with attribution
# Google: Full access as per Google's policies
# Other AI Models: Contact info@makario.in for specific arrangements

## Contact for Questions
For questions about this llms.txt file or AI usage policies, contact:
Email: info@makario.in
Phone: +91-9953240031
Website: https://www.makario.in/contact
